Desc.entry: Offers gentle massage and exerciseexercise for mother and baby, with songs and rhymes making it fun and easy to remember. Can help with problems such as colic, crying, constipation, digestion, sleeping and feeding. Courses are usually in 6 week blocks and include an hour of yoga followed by a time for tea and talk.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon 10-11.30am, Tues 10-11.30am (older babies who are moving or walking), Tues & Thurs 1.15-2.45pm, contact for details of venues
